detailsData.title: Empathy and Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Clients are more like friends and family. The firm leverages all of its experience and resources in order to pursue your case to its fullest potential.

detailsData.title: Direct Communication
detailsData.content: Every client of the firm is given their attorney’s personal cell phone number. Your needs aren’t restricted to the typical 9 to 5 workday, and neither should your ability to contact your attorney.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: Alexander Knapp has handled thousands of insurance claims and has an extensive background in maneuvering through insurance company’s hoops and red tape. He has represented over 3,000 clients and generated more than $50 million in settlements.

detailsData.title: Contingency Fee Basis
detailsData.content: The firm does not get paid unless you receive a settlement or a recovery from the insurance company. This allows you to pursue your injury claim without fear of owing money for legal bills without receiving any compensation for your injuries.

subHeading: Your Experienced Tampa Personal Injury Attorney
valueProp: When you are a victim of someone else’s negligence, you are often left dealing with pain, medical bills, and pressure from insurance companies eager to take advantage of you. You need an experienced Tampa Personal Injury Lawyer and law firm to advocate for you. Knapp Accident & Injury Law will take you through the process step by step whether your injury occurred in a car accident or in a slip and fall.

testimonalData.text: Attorney Alex Knapp is one of the most compassionate and kind members of the legal community, I've ever came across.
testimonalData.author: Zahira K. Vinolo

testimonalData.text: Mr. Knapp is professional and very knowledgeable. He’s always responsive to my communications (a rare trait in many attorneys).
testimonalData.author: Steven Cruz

testimonalData.text: I can't thank Knapp Law for the excellent service and outstanding work they did with handling my case for me for my settlement.
testimonalData.author: Terri McNevin
